item.description:
Please join Crawl in Boston on August 11th to tour the Faneuil Hall area. We're excited to be bringing you our first ever "Where's Waldo?" Crawl. One of the most popular American cartoon icons is invading the city with a bar crawl that will not be soon forgotten.Where's Waldo/Wanda Costumes are mandatory! Get your costume together, RSVP, join us and many more for this crazy fun bar crawl!

Now with a photo booth at one of the bars!

More info at http://crawlinboston.com
item.name: Where's Waldo? Bar Crawl
